## Install

### 1. Reset to factory settings

`%%SpecCode93`

![%%SpecCode93](data:image/gif;base64,)

### 2. Set communication mode to Bluetooth HID

`%%SpecCodeAA`

![%%SpecCodeAA](data:image/gif;base64,)

### 3. De-activate startup sound

`^#SC^30300D0`

![^#SC^30300D0](data:image/gif;base64,)

### 4. De-activate read sound

`%%SpecCode94`

![%%SpecCode94](data:image/gif;base64,)

### 5. Activate vibrations

`%%SpecCode77`

![%%SpecCode77](data:image/gif;base64,)

### 6. Set sleep time to 30 sec

`%%SpecCode30`

![%%SpecCode30](data:image/gif;base64,)

### 7. Set keyboard to FR

`%%SpecCode42`

![%%SpecCode42](data:image/gif;base64,)

## External links

- [Tera Digital - Manual download page](https://tera-digital.com/pages/instructions)
- [(EVHK0012-1) EV0008-2 FT0136-2 Manual printed with Tera 1100 (barcode X0011FBRCV) (13Mb)](https://fr.scribd.com/document/458077047/EVHK0012-1-Manual-for-Mini-Wireless-Bluetooth-Barcode-Scanner-1D-2D-QR-Code)
- [original manual but un-compressed (54Mb)](https://www.dropbox.com/s/w32ud2t8s6pgrex/%28EVHK0012-1%29%20Manual%20for%20Mini%20Wireless%20Bluetooth%20Barcode%20Scanner%201D%202D%281%29.pdf?dl=0)
